gd.gen-ai.invalid-question: Invalid question. Give it another go.
gd.gen-ai.global-error: A bloke didn't see this stuff-up coming.
gd.gen-ai.global-error.button-clear: Clear chat and give it another go
gd.gen-ai.disclaimer: AI mates can stuff up. Double-check before you bank on their responses.
gd.gen-ai.welcome.line-2: How can I give you a hand mate?
